column4: Does anyone know why there's no MenuBar in my Terminal? or is it new in karmic 9.10? http://nopaste.info/8179603c82.html (it does have "Show MenuBar enables with right-click)
btw, anyone on xchat here? xchat should also have a menu bar right?
it should have one by default, but you can try adding one (right click panel, add to panel, menu bar)
oh sorry, confused what you were talking about, nm
